subject: docs: update security report to reflect implemented spam prevention
body:
Mark spam prevention recommendations as IMPLEMENTED:
- ✅ Rate limiting (30 msgs/min, 15 chats/hour, 3 reports/hour)
- ✅ Content validation (10k char limit)
- ✅ Auto-flagging system (rapid-fire, identical messages, multiple reports)
- ✅ Edge Function protection (honeypot validation, stack traces removed)

Update Executive Summary:
- Change 'recommendations for monitoring and rate limiting' to 'recommendations for monitoring'
- Add '✅ Spam prevention implemented (2024-12-29)'

Update Section 1.5, 1.6, and 3.4 with implementation details and dates.
title: update security report to reflect implemented spam prevention
